name: MeetingZone
signal_source: Remote work coordination shows users need 'one window of overlapping times where most employees can sync' across time zones
description: Smart meeting scheduler that finds optimal time slots across multiple time zones for small teams
target_user: Small team leaders and remote workers who struggle to find meeting times that work across different time zones
pain_point_evidence: Users report difficulty with 'delays in responses waiting for colleagues in other time zones to come online' affecting project momentum
differentiation: Small team focus vs. enterprise solutions, optimal time finding over basic conversion
subscription_fit: Premium includes calendar integration, recurring meeting optimization, and team analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic scheduling, premium for integrations and advanced features
